description: Detects UTF-8 and UTF-16 Base64 encoded powershell 'Invoke-' calls
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
Harjot Singh
@cyb3rjy0t
name: PowerShell Base64 Encoded Invoke Keyword
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-e*" AND process.command_line.text:("*SQBuAHYAbwBrAGUALQ*" OR "*kAbgB2AG8AawBlAC0A*" OR "*JAG4AdgBvAGsAZQAtA*" OR "*SW52b2tlL*" OR "*ludm9rZS*" OR "*JbnZva2Ut*"))
